- Location: Front yard and front fa√ßade of single-story house.  
- Vegetation: Overgrown lawn with tall grasses and weeds; vegetation along foundation and right-front area.  
- Exterior materials: Light blue siding with brick veneer on the right front section; white entry door and porch posts.  
- Maintenance/Pest risk: Vegetation in contact with siding/foundation may trap moisture and invite pests; trim back or remove as needed.  
- Grading/Drainage: No visible water pooling; ensure soil slopes away from foundation when landscaping.
